reviewText: too much porn not enough action!

There is an assassination plot against a lord because he has no heirs. He is trapped at his location while his concubine is at another. Our female Ninja Tsbame has the special ability to store his seed in her womb for several days and then deliver it to the concubine which promises to be the climax of the film...and it was.

Lots of soft core porn. Not much Ninja fighting.
The item arrived on time and was just as expected. It played as expected and is a very good movie. I like this product and highly recommend the seller. I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Ninja She Devil is one of those Japanese movies that is a guilty pleasure. It's not high on ninja action and it's not high on acting. But what it does do is fill your appetite for sexy Japanese women.
As with most of the Japanese action movies, this didn't disappoint.  Great action movie, but that was all some of these movies need better scripts.

1. This not for kids.  There sex in it but not porn and is brief esspicial the "Lesibian" sex scene in the end.
2. The Fighting is laxing but brief.
3. There's no Dubbing, which means to understand the movie you have to read the subtitles at same time.
4. During the credits you get to see the making of this movie, not much there for this.
This movie gets a 5 because I love Asami.  The movie is not bad, it is not great.  It's a movie you buy for the obvious reasons.
